label: ScreePlot
info: Determine the Number of Factors to Extract in Factor Analysis. Count how many green triangles are there before the black line cuts the green line. That's the optimal no. of factors.

categories.label: input
categories.info: Controls to specify parameters of the scree plot

input_columns.label: variables
input_columns.info: Two or more columns selected to product the scree plot.

input_rep.label: replications
input_rep.info: number of replications of the correlation matrix

input_cent.label: quantile
input_cent.info: quantile of the distribution on which the decision is made
